vault_path.description: Absolute path to the local TS4Rebels mod vault.

vault_structure_preset.description: How folder structure is interpreted for metadata inference.

manifest_paths.description: List of JSON/CSV manifest file paths.

diagnostics_retention_days.description: Number of days to retain diagnostics history.

redact_local_paths_in_exports.description: If true, removes local file paths from exported reports.

redact_username_in_exports.description: If true, strips usernames from paths and messages in exports.

exclude_non_ts4rebels_mods_from_exports.description: If true, exports only include mods in the TS4Rebels vault.
